description: Partnering with MicroLED and AR/VR Connect I’ve been asked to partner with the joint MicroLED and AR/VR Connect conference and exhibition in Eindhoven, the Netherlands, on September 24-25, 2025. The Conference operates like a single conference with two tracks, so attendees attend presentations from both. There is also an exhibition at the physical Conference. As […]
title: MicroLED & AR/VR Connect in Eindhoven 24-25 September 2025 (and March 6-7 Virtual Conference)
